title: Patch 8.1 Frequently disconnecting in game
body:
Hello,
i have random little disconnects in game. These disconnects last for just a few seconds. "Attempting to Reconnect" pops up, i cant move and after 2-5sec it works again. Sometimes i dont dc at all, sometimes every few minutes. My ping is constantly on 38ms.
I have reinstalled Windows 10, i currently have no firewall, i have a LAN connection, i have changed the DNS Server, i have no third party programs for league, all of my drivers should be up to date as well.
I also disabled a Windows Service called "Superfetch" which made it better, but the problem is still there...

Does anyone have a suggestion, is there something i can do?
Any Help is appreciated :)
Ginxß

EDIT: Since I created Port forwarding entries for all the Ports LoL needs, i dont have the Problem anymore...

replies.body: I've been checking around and it does seem that there have been a good number of EUW ISP issues relatively lately, so I'm wondering if these dc's might just be related to random hiccups here and there. I'd still absolutely try some of the other steps outlined in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a basis, but go ahead and try running a quick traceroute to the EUW servers at 185.40.65.1 for me. That'll let me know what's going on here.

since the the new patch i have dc`s all over, never had that before... can pls support from EUW give an advice, cause it should be their job and not yours..... how can new patches always be worse... wtf is going on their, pls just test your stuff before you make it public

Traceroot:
  1     <1 ms    <1 ms     <1 ms  fritz.box [192.168.178.1]
  2     19 ms    18 ms     18 ms  62.155.243.152
  3     26 ms    30 ms     30 ms  217.239.45.50
  4      *            25 ms     25 ms  62.157.250.58
  5      *              *               *      overtime
  6      *              *               *      overtime
  7      *            33 ms     32 ms  104.160.141.103
  8     32 ms    32 ms     32 ms  104.160.141.103
  9     32 ms    32 ms     31 ms  10.31.246.118
 10    32 ms    32 ms     33 ms  10.31.246.118

after that its just overtime...

ping 185.40.65.1 is also just overtime (4 Packages sent, 4 lost)
is that normal?

That 'overtime' sounds a lot like it's timing out on those nodes and wasn't getting a signal back, and that "4 packets sent and 4 lost" shows 100% packet loss (even though it's a very small amount of packets overall). 

Since this does seem like it's being caused by packet loss, I'm curious if this is due to some of the EU ISP issues I've noticed here and there. I don't want to miss anything though, so be sure to shoot the techs a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with this traceroute info too. They might have you do another for a longer amount of time, but still with them and they should be able to figure something out!
Gets to the 9th entry @ 10.31.246.118, followed by overtime
You are not the only one. Happens in various time spans. Usually goes back to normal in a few seconds. Just once lead to a DC. Hoping for a hotfix.
It's not just an EUW issue. I have this same reoccurring issue. The spans between disconnection varies, but only lasts 3-5 seconds.
